overview: The iconic Finke Desert Race, the largest off-road motorsport event in the southern hemisphere and Australia's fastest, deadliest, toughest and certainly dustiest race. Filmed over three years, Finke explores the race from within â€“ competitors, organisers, paramedics, and the drive to win against the desert at all costs.  Finke is a visual adventure of inspiration and danger, excitement and spills.
title: Finke: There & Back
